#include <stdio.h>

long long findMaxDiffSum(long long num) {

	if(num==1)
		return 0;
	else
		return (num*num-2)/2;
}


int main() {

	int numQueries;
	scanf("%d", &numQueries);

	while(numQueries>0){
		long long num;
		scanf("%lld", &num);
		long long sum = findMaxDiffSum(num);
		printf("%lld\n",sum);
		numQueries--;
	}
}
